summary: Easily Remove(aka hide substitute), Erase and Add learned spells via MCM menu and hotkey.
descriptionHtml:
Easily add, remove(aka hide) and erase learned spells via MCM and hotkey. Please be careful and don't erase spells needed for quest, etc - you can break your game!

Features:
Add one or all removed spells via MCM menu
Remove one or all learned spells via MCM menu (Care! It don't support starting spells "thanks to" papyrus GetNthSpell function)
Remove equipped spells via MCM menu.
Remove equipped spells via hotkey. Can choose to remove spell from: both hands, left hand or right hand.
Restore spells from removed list. Each school own one list with 128 slots.
Allow remove spells up to 128, next spell will be not removed unless remove list has an empty slot.
Erase equipped spells via MCM menu.
Erase equipped spells via hotkey. Can choose to erase spell from: both hands, left hand or right hand.
Restore spells from erased list. Only last 128 erased spells are on list. Allow erase spells without slot limit.
Support 128 spells per school for learned and removed list - not tested, i never had more than 5 x 128 x 2 spells. (Can be expanded to 65k if i learn a bit more about scripting).
Languages ENG, PL (Localization via mcm translation file, feel free to send me translated localization text file, i will add it to next version.)

Removed vs Erased Spells
Removed spells are moved to 5 lists (one per school), each list has 128 slots. Erased spells are moved to one list(queue ) with 128 slots.
Removed spells always can be restored by contrast to erased,  which can be restored only to the last 128 spells. Only last 128 erased spells are on list.
The concept behind "removed" spells is ability to "hide" spells from spell menu to make it more clear. Option "Erased spells" is made for situations where you need to delete spell for good.

[s]I'm going to make "Shout/Power organizer". Features: remove equipped shout/power and add removed shout/power from mcm menu list.
[/s]It's done.

Beware!!!
I'm newbie modder, this is my first mod written from scratch and my first contact with papyrus scripting. If someone find any bug i will be glad to remove it.

MY OTHER MODS:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89207]Shout Organizer[/url]﻿ - Easily Remove and Add equipped shouts and powers via MCM menu and hotkey. [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15559]SE version[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15558]SE Version of Spell Organizer.[/url]
author: MaskedRPGFan
